roleDescription: A senior-level professional responsible for overseeing all marketing activities within an organization. They develop strategies, manage budgets, set goals, and ensure brand consistency.
responsibilities: Craft strategies for all Marketing teams, including Digital, Advertising, Communications, and Creative
Prepare and manage monthly, quarterly, and annual budgets for the Marketing department
Set, monitor, and report on team goals
Design branding, positioning, and pricing strategies
Ensure strong and consistent brand message across all channels and marketing efforts
Analyze consumer behavior and determine customer personas
Identify opportunities to reach new market segments and expand market share
Craft quarterly and annual hiring plans
Monitor competition and coordinate sales and marketing efforts to boost brand awareness
educationRequirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Management, Marketing, Communications, or related field
Master's degree in Communications, Business, or related field is advantageous
workExperience: Progressive experience in marketing roles, culminating in a senior position such as Head of Marketing or VP Marketing
skills: Leadership with the ability to set and prioritize goals
Problem-solving and analytical skills to devise data-driven strategies
Teamwork and interpersonal skills for effective collaboration
Experience with web analytics, Google Adwords, and CRM software
